content: ok I identified the source of the problem in the US-Core IG. And it's horrible.
Horrible = nasty to fix or Horrible = potentially impacting normative content?
At least you don't have anything else going on right now...

the problem is that the narrative generation is done in r4 (after conversion from R3), and then the resource is back converted to R3. Using the java converter, which is not officially supported for non-conformance resources
I worked around it for US-Core by fixing the version conversion for the affected fields. but that's not a fix
